body_html:
I might be missing something, but I think this PR inconsistently adds two functions that are not explictly defined in this file.

The fix for PyCharm and other editors will be to add .pyi files, and a PR for that is on the way #12500
body_text:
I might be missing something, but I think this PR inconsistently adds two functions that are not explictly defined in this file.
The fix for PyCharm and other editors will be to add .pyi files, and a PR for that is on the way #12500
body:
I might be missing something, but I think this PR inconsistently adds two functions that are not explictly defined in this file.

The fix for PyCharm and other editors will be to add `.pyi` files, and a PR for that is on the way https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/12500
